TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
5 hours ago, Scarecrow71 said:

Granted.  You get beaten up by the father of the baby you took it from.

I wish that I was a transformer.

Granted. You are a transformer from a broken down microwave.

Now I wish for a new microwave oven.

Edited January 7, 2022 by Exploro
Misread wish. Fixed.

Granted. But the wave is so micro that you hardly can cook anything but baked ants.

I wish for a webcam near the Sgr A*.

Granted: but it is found and you are arrested for being a peeping tom.

I wish I understood the instant teleporter badges they introduced in Star Trek Discovery, season 3.

Granted. Now you are a StarTrek expendable NPC and can't escape because the ST fizzix is incompatible to the irl.

I wish Lexx had entered the StarTrek universe and modified it in its usual way.

Granted.  Lex Luthor is now part of Star Trek canon.

I wish Jon Cryer had never been cast as Lex Luthor.

Granted. You reappear in the reality where nobody heard about Star Trek.

I wish Mantrid and his Arms had entered the StarTrek universe and modified it in its* usual way.

(* As we can only conditionally treat Mantrid as a human person.)

Edited January 7, 2022 by kerbiloid

Granted: But they go back in time and reset the time line yet again.

I wish I could think of a good pun.

Granted, the pun was so good everyone liked it, you became the pun king. You can't make a bad pun, though, so you'll have to think of outstanding puns like it's your full-time job.

I wish someone knows my secret

Granted, Everybody knows where you live on, and then you die after massive Protest Fan Group Suffocation.

I wish the Power of QWERTY!

Granted, you accidentally learn the power of AZERTY

I wish for someone to know the 2-15-6 thing

Granted. 2% of deposit interest, 15% of tax, 6 months before first withdrawal

I wish ZX Spectrum had 4 GB of RAM in my years.

Granted.  ZX Spectrum achieves 4GB of RAM 1 second before your untimely death.

I wish I would have known that you were going through this and that I was the only person that could be able to help.

Granted, you were the last to know he was going through this. At least you knew, just not too early though.

I wish to go interstellar today (in KSP of course)

Granted, as you Install Galaxies Unbound, Grannus Expansion Pack, Extrasolar, and yet even many planet mods(which i could include, but i like the first 3 ones), your pc goes full launchsite 110 3 july Baikonur Cosmodrome, exactly when N1 did his job.

I wish a powerful Telescope.

Granted. Spend 10 billion dollars and get a copy of the JWST!
I wish Blueshift would not take 4 hours to download.

Granted: Now when it reaches 3 hours it hangs indefinitely.

I wish people would write out the full name so we don't have to guess or look up the acronym.

Granted, but it's corrupted by the server.

I wish KSP to be better.

Granted. The KSP-2 release date is shifted by five years more.

I wish New Horizons had met 'Oumuamua,

Granted, New Horizons is now a rebel spacecraft since Omuamua was actually an evil alien craft.

I wish to know who's Stephen on Swift's Hey Stephen song.

Granted. Stephen is a hey, as it follows from the title.

I wish Sedna had a moon.

Granted, it was made by some nefarious Type II civilization and shattered Sedna without anyone noticing.

I wish for that nefarious Type II civilization's moon to just don't be hungry for energy

Granted, and it looses energy and momentum and dives into the Sun.

I wish this to happen:

https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1759189883740586227/9530B5A74D073B6252FDD7705D038C0DB909EE20/?imw=1024&imh=768&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true

(the rover is Perseverance, btw)
Granted, but now kerbals cover Mars and they leave damage that screw with our attempts to determine if Mars ever had life on it
No wish was granted
I wish that I could read better.
